select poi.id, poi.space_id, poi.vehicle_id, poi.start_date, poi.end_date, poi.total_time, poi.price, poi.total_price, poi.pay_date, si.name as spaceName, si.`space` as spaceAddress, vi.vehicle_number , vi.images as vehicleImages, ui.code, ui.name, ui.images, ui.phone, ui.email from park_order_info poi left join space_info si on (si.id = poi.space_id) left join vehicle_info vi on (vi.id = poi.vehicle_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = vi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.spaceName},'%')
AND vi.vehicle_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.vehicleNumber},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.userName},'%')
order by poi.pay_date desc
